      • chatAlreadyExists

        public static boolean chatAlreadyExists(java.lang.String user1,
                                        java.lang.String user2)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Checks if a chat already exists between these two users
        Parameters:
        user1 - the first user
        user2 - the second user
        Returns:
        returns true if a chat already exists, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - throws an IOException if something network related implodes
